tool_description: Guitar News Aggregator - AcousticGuitar.com - GuitarPlayer.com - GuitarWorld.com - GuitarGirlMag.com
name: Guitar Haven
title: Guitar Haven

api_list.name: Get Source Detail by Source
api_list.description: Get the details for a specific source
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://guitar-haven.p.rapidapi.com/sourcesWithDetails/guitar_com"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "guitar-haven.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://guitar-haven.p.rapidapi.com/sourcesWithDetails/{sourceid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "guitar-haven.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All News By One Provider
api_list.description: This endpoint retrieves all gather data by one news source
api_list.code:

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "guitar-haven.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

print(response.json())
